api.owner_id: ID OF THE OWNERS ACCOUNT HERE
api.token: IF YOUR ACCOUNT IS OF BOT TYPE - THIS NEEDS TO BE FILLED OUT WITH YOUR API TOKEN

execute_allowed.ID_0: ID OF MEMBERS ALLOWED TO USE THE EXECUTE COMMAND

reddit.enabled: true OR false DEPENDING ON IF YOU WANT REDDIT FEATURES

users._COMMENT: THIS USER ARRAY WILL BE FILLED ON CALL OF THE ID COMMAND
